alert.note: Alert for Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:18PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Morrill County through 445 PM MDT... At 418 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alliance Airport, or 9 miles southeast of Alliance, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Morrill County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.
